name: Facebook Chat
short_description:
*DEAD*

Here for Archival purposes.

Facebook has now released an official desktop application for chat, and they have disabled the pop-out chat feature, which this small program was based on.

This program was written with Visual Basic.  It was a browser that was automatically directed to the pop-out chat URL.  That's all it was, nothing more.  While it was working, it received nearly 5,000 downloads.

I posted it and forgot about it, to be honest.  It was such a simple project that I had no intention of maintaining it.  It's fantastic to see how popular it was - especially because I am really not a programmer.  I was messing around and stumbled on something useful.

To everyone who enjoyed it while it was working:  Thanks for your downloads and the feedback you left over the years - which I am only now catching up on.  I'm sorry, but as of now it is permanently discontinued, and there are far better options available.

-Nick Highland
